components.description:
A reanimated human, often found in works of horror fiction. May have a female or male appearance.

May be used to refer to someone who appears listless, apathetic, or unresponsive to their surroundings.

May also be used to refer to a person who attempts to resume communications after previously ghosting out of a conversation.
components.title: Zombie

description:

title: Zombie

version.description:
Unicode 10.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on June 20, 2017. 8,518 new characters were included with this update, of which 56 were emoji characters.

Only new emoji code points are listed on this page. For the full 2017 emoji list; see Emoji 5.0 which included all 239 emoji additions including sequences for skin tone and gender.
